attributes.action: Ban the user stupidwheelie from the Digital Spy forums - permanently!
attributes.additional_details:
Not only is she incredibly highly strung and seems to think of herself as a the forum police, but she also had the audacity to create a SECOND account Akane Tendo! Now we all know that having two DS forum accounts is a violation of the T&Cs in itself, and she may have deceived some people on the forums, even the mods perhaps, but certainly not me!

See to it that the mods perma-ban the user stupidwheelie and order will then be restored.
